title: Need for Speed Rivals - Black Box
description:
Welcome to Redview County, a gritty open road environment where the intensity of the streetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ultimate rivalry between cops and racers never stops.

Watch the stakes grow through a new scoring system that lets racers risk their speed points to shoot for higher multipliers and greater rewards, or bank their speed points safely when they return to a hideout. The more risk you take on, the faster you can progress, but get busted by the cops and they take your speed points as a reward. Hundreds of thousands of speed points can be at stake at every turn and at every bust Ã¢â‚¬â€œ will you go from hero to zero?

Note: This game has had its videos ripped to reduce the size, the game has NO VIDEOS.


How to install:

* Install .NET Framework 4.5 if you don't already have it
* Run the setup
* Follow instructions
* Start the game from Desktop
* Support the game developers. If you like the game, buy it!

Note: the installation will NOT work without .NET Framework 4.5
